item.title: Report X-2023081941
item.description:
Report X-2023081941

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023081941 SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found inside QA cage. DescribePack: One of the paint cans had a loosed lid causing it to spill out. DurationRel: 9 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was placed in Hazmat tote and brought to QA cage for further inspection. 2. X-2023081959 SequenceEvent: Package found unloading, transported in a red tote and taken to QA DescribePack: contents appear to be crushed which caused internal leakage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: transported in a red tote and taken to QA

item.title: Report X-2023090084
item.description:
Report X-2023090084

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO RESPOND TO LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. RESPONDER USED SPILL CART AND WENT TO UNLOAD DISCOVERED LEAKING HAZMAT. RESPONDER PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY THEN BROUGHT BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER.

item.title: Report X-2023081809
item.description:
Report X-2023081809

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was put on the IC rollers by a package handler. The drum fell of as it was going down the rollers causing it to break open on the bottom. DescribePack: Broke on the bottom of metal drum. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and spill tote.
